text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha ao khnhom teanglay robsa yeung del ban bampean leu khluoneng. chaur puok anak kom asasangkhum champoh kdei me tda krounea robsa a l laoh aoy saoh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh nung aphytosa nouv real tosakamhosa teangoasa . pitabrakd nasa trong chea mcheasa mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
